scripts.dev: npm run db:generate && dotenv -e .env.development -- nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.dev.json' src/index.ts
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration:local: dotenv -e .env.test -- sh -c 'npm run db:migrate-test && jest --config jest.integ.config.js --runInBand --silent --forceExit'
scripts.db:migrate-local: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_EXTERNAL" npx prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:migrate-local:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_EXTERNAL" npx prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:migrate-test: dotenv -e .env.test -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_EXTERNAL" npx prisma migrate reset --force'
scripts.db:reset-local: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_EXTERNAL" npx prisma migrate reset --force'
scripts.db:reset-local:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- sh -c 'DATABASE_URL="$DATABASE_URL_EXTERNAL" npx prisma migrate reset --force'
